markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Predator's Pounce](/Feats.aspx?ID=164) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 92 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[animal instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=1)

**Requirements**
You are unarmored or wearing light armor.

</column>

---

You close the distance to your prey in a blur, pouncing on the creature before it can react. You Stride up to your Speed and make a Strike at the end of your movement.
name: Predator's Pounce
requirement: You are unarmored or wearing light armor.
requirement_markdown: You are unarmored or wearing light armor.
